title: "Unable to connect to chat..."
body:
Whenever I log into League I cannot connect to the chat, I've tried the "Reconnect to Chat" button several times, the normal fixes have not been working for me (changing the time on my computer, deleting a certain file, or the repair tool). 

Anyone else still having this issue? I looked for some answers but nothing worked. :(

replies.body: Mine doesn't work either. This happened a couple hours ago and I tried the basic fixes and nothing is working. I'm also from Texas
Please fix this issue, or at least address it. I know there are plenty of moderators, and reds on these boards and this is seriously something that needs to be discussed.
This^^^^ Rito come on.....
I think it's safe to say that Texas is having a chat problem someone please help or respond to this thread ASAP... trying to grind out of gold

> [{quoted}](name=Shadowrun,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ITPxFeII,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-03-04T13:39:01.044+0000)
>
> I think it's safe to say that Texas is having a chat problem someone please help or respond to this thread ASAP... trying to grind out of gold

My friend lives in Austin and is doing fine. I am in the southeast area if that matters.
Southeast Texas for me as well and I'm also having chat issues.
Idk if area matters but I am in west texas.
I'm in Houston. It's happening for me also.
I can't connect to chat too... located in Texas as well...
Please fix this :/
Same Issue. I live in Dallas
also having problems i'm from south texas
Lets all file tickets if you haven't already ive been trying to reply to red posters to get their attention hopefully
im in mid texas  waco   and i cant cannoect either but my friend in washington can =/
man i thought it was only me i was playing fine till  around 2:00 a.m im also from south east Texas. Rito plz help us.
yeah mine can't connect to chat i'm in louisiana
Mmmmm so this is a twist. :P
Im in West Texas as well must be regional Texas after all is huge lol
True....damm I hope they fix it soon. This is one of my only days off. lol
same problem located in texas too.
I am having the same problem.....where are you located. I am In Texas. Rito plz help

I also Just north of Houston Texas. Issue occurred around 1 AM last night and has persisted throughout the day. Please Help Riot! This is really infuriating! I am a Comcast customer if that makes any difference.

Hiya! 

We're currently investigating the issue. MuffyKing [made a post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/Nf5ToE3O-client-alot-of-players-from-southern-states-cant-connect-to-client-chat?comment=0004) regarding this issue, and how you can provide more info to help us get to the bottom of this. :]
Far west Texas, Problem is here also.
Bump. Having the same issue
i'm in houston, texas and can not connect!
My fellow Houstonian :D I cant connect either (Houston, Tx)
Same from Texas. Rito please fix this
Also having the same problem, located in Texas as well. Around central/ south of Texas. I was re-logging around 12-1 am.
